title: Back To School Specials 2 Bedrooms
posting_body: ['Ready for School?', 'Need a new 2 bedroom to settle in?', 'We have 2 bedrooms ready to go for August lst.', 'Freshly Painted, Ceiling Fans, Mini-Blinds, Hardwood Floors, Central Heating, Spacious bedrooms w/Carpeting and closets, Nice Bathrooms, Spacious Kitchen w/Appliances, Back Porch, Private Yards, Great Neighbors, Some with Sunny Sun Porch for your plants or having a nice cup of coffee.', 'Close to Everything.', 'No Pets Allowed..', 'Tenants Pay All Utilities.', 'Close to new schools and churches and expressways.', '$1150.00- $1175.00 per month.', 'We have (2) locations renting right now.', '1901 S. Springfield (Newer Rehab, Hardwood Floors, Sunporch) $1175.00', '3934 W. 19th Street Hardwood Floors, Gorgeous Huge Kitchen for the Cook)', 'Call or Text Rosa 773-368-6813 to View now.', 'Hurry only (3) left.']
